Package net.javacoding.jspider.mod.rule

Class Summary
AcceptAllRule Rule implementation that accepts all given URLs.
BaseSiteOnlyRule Rule implementation that only decides to accept a URL in case the resource to which this url points lies in the site of the original starting point of spidering.
BaseURLOnlyRule $Id: BaseURLOnlyRule.java,v 1.1 2003/04/03 16:10:49 vanrogu Exp $
ExternallyReferencedOnlyRule Rule implementation that only accepts a resource URL if it is external to the site currently being spidered.
ForbiddenPathRule $Id: ForbiddenPathRule.java,v 1.1 2003/04/03 16:10:51 vanrogu Exp $
InternallyReferencedOnlyRule Rule implementation that only accepts a resource URL if it is internal to the site currently being spidered.
OnlyDeeperInSiteRule $Id: OnlyDeeperInSiteRule.java,v 1.1 2003/04/03 16:10:52 vanrogu Exp $
OnlyHttpProtocolRule Rule implementation that only accepts a resource URL if it points to a resource that is accessible over HTTP.
RejectAllRule Implementation of a Rule that rejects all urls.
TextHtmlMimeTypeOnlyRule $Id: TextHtmlMimeTypeOnlyRule.java,v 1.1 2003/04/03 16:10:52 vanrogu Exp $
